comments.body: We should actually use the json name in the comment (`disruptionsAllowed`); I like to use backticks to make it even more obvious and less weird to start the sentence with a lowercase letter.

Given that it's not officially documented I won't block the PR, I guess

(Note that it being wrong in other places isn't a reason I accept as valid for keeping it wrong here :) )
